333380.name: SilverQuest: Gaiden
333380.description:
This game has suspended development for the time being. We plan to start over as an ARPG using the world of SilverQuest: Gaiden.

If you purchase this game, please be aware that it will change a lot in the future.

---

SilverQuest: Gaiden was originally started as "miniflake" in 2009, released as a solo project by I-GAME-ART, the game was launched into alpha state on a website called Desura, and later Steam. Wolfgame came on to do additional artwork and design in 2012. The goals were to create a deeply expandable roguelike with a classic black and white design.

Unfortunately, that did not come to plan as I-GAME-ART had to stop working on the game and games in general around 2012. Since then, the game has been frozen in time on Steam.

The current game and its source code will be released at a later date.

Thank you.
333380.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
